name: Links: The Challenge of Golf
description:
It's a beautiful spring day as you prepare to tee off. Is it a day at your favorite course? Not quite, but it's the next best thing. LINKS The Challenge of Golf is a classic sports simulator that defined the way golf games are being made up to this day!

Features:
  • Vintage 256-color VGA graphics with 3D contoured terrain
  • Accurate physics of the flight and impact of the golf ball
  • A challenging golf course with terrain features.
  • Three levels of difficulty: Pro, Amateur & Beginner
  • Adjustable golfer's stance and swing plane
  • All the sounds of true golf...from commentary and wildlife to the sound of your swing
